mapper.insert: insert into group_attend(user_id, group_id, enter_time, color) values(#{user_id}, #{group_id}, now(), #{color});
insert into group_list(group_id, title, memo , writer, upload_date) values(#{group_id}, #{title}, #{memo}, #{writer}, now());
insert into group_attend(group_id, user_id, enter_time, color) values(#{group_id}, #{writer}, now(), #{color});
mapper.select: select gl.group_id , gl.title , gl.memo , gl.writer, (select nickname from userprofile u where u.id = gl.writer) as nickname, (select count(*) from group_attend ga2 where ga2.group_id = ga.group_id) as total, ga.color from group_attend ga , group_list gl where gl.group_id = ga.group_id and ga.user_id =#{id};
SELECT u.nickname , u.id, ga.group_id from group_attend ga, userprofile u WHERE ga.group_id = #{id} and ga.user_id = u.id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM group_attend WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND group_id = #{group_id};
DELETE FROM calendar WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND group_id = #{group_id};
delete ga, gl, ca from group_attend ga join group_list gl on ga.group_id = gl.group_id join calendar ca on ga.group_id = ca.group_id where ga.group_id = #{group_id};
